title: SOLD: 1874 Harper's Weekly - Boston w/Spalding, O'Rourke, G. Wright & H. Wright
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1874 Harper's Weekly - Boston w/Spalding, O'Rourke, G. Wright & H. Wright
posts.post_content:
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very scarce 1874 Harper's Weekly Woodcut picturing the Boston BB Club including 4 Hall of Famers, George Wright, Harry Wright, Jim O'Rourke & Albert Spalding. This beauty is in excellent condition as shown in the scan and back of the item is standard newspaper text. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner.My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
